LightningComponentBundle.description: Displays Google Street View panorama for the contact's address location with interactive navigation

property.name: googleMapsApiKey
property.label: Google Maps API Key
property.description: Your Google Maps Street View Static API key. Get one at https://developers.google.com/maps/documentation/streetview/get-api-key

property.name: height
property.label: Street View Height (pixels)
property.description: Height of the Street View image in pixels

property.name: width
property.label: Street View Width (pixels)
property.description: Width of the Street View image in pixels (max 640)

property.name: pitch
property.label: Camera Pitch (-90 to 90)
property.description: Camera pitch in degrees (0=Straight, positive=Up, negative=Down)

property.name: fov
property.label: Field of View (10-120)
property.description: Field of view in degrees (default 90, lower=zoomed in)

property.name: zoom
property.label: Zoom (Deprecated)
property.description: Deprecated - use Field of View instead
